channel.title: HackTheBox on 0xHippo's Blog
channel.description: Recent content in HackTheBox on 0xHippo's Blog

item.title: Blunder
item.description: Blunder is a hilariously memorable box because of the simplicity behind exploiting CVE-2019-14287, a sudo version vulnerability, to gain root access. It starts out with a simple blog using the Bludit CMS. We find a version number that happens to be vulnerable to bypassing anti-brute force measures. Recon Nmap We always start with our standard nmap scan. I typically immediately go to the script and version detection scan across all ports.
